title: iCloud phishing
extract: Phishing scam in iCloud. ... The iCloud users are targeted by this campaign. Enterprise network security researchers comment that the scam begins when a phishing email is delivered to an iCloud account; text in phishing emails is similar to Apple's legitimate emails.Aug 11, 2018
extract_html: Phishing scam in iCloud. ... The iCloud users are targeted by this campaign. Enterprise network security researchers comment that the scam begins when a phishing email is delivered to an iCloud account; text in phishing emails is similar to Apple's legitimate emails.Aug 11, 2018
